name: ManaWar
description:
Mana War has entered Early Access!

Mana War is an online turned based miniatures game where two teams compete to score victory points by using a customized group of Heroes to fight on the battlefield and capture objectives.

This game consists of rounds which are divided into three phases: Movement Phase, Ability Phase, and Capture Phase. 

Teams take turns moving their heroes, fighting, and capturing objectives. 

Abilities and captures are attempted through an actual dice roll that is shown in game.

Mana Crystals are placed throughout the battlefield, where Grunts and Heroes can be used to capture them. Mana Crystals are a resource each team can use to boost their Heroes' power.

Players earn Mana Power by playing in online matches. Mana Power can be used to unlock new Heroes.

Players can also purchase Gold that can be used to buy new Dice skins, Base skins, and Grunt models for their teams. Purchases help support the development of Mana War.

To kick off Early Access, I have 20 Heroes available, 10 for the Savagery Faction and 10 for the Fellowship Faction. All players start with 5 unlocked Heroes for each of these Factions.

This is just the beginning folks! The next thing on my list is to add 10 Heroes for the Shadow Faction and 10 Heroes for the Mayhem Faction. I will be adding nearly 100 Heroes to this game, with more game types and missions to play, and a 2v2 and 3v3 online PVP mode, and more! I will also be adding new skins for Dice, Bases, and Grunts. 

Gameplay is most important, and I am looking to build a community and use input from my players to help make this game the best it can be.

Please join, subscribe, and follow Mana War social media so you can share your voice and opinions on this game.
